price: (22) And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ نِعۡمَةٞ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنۡ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: watil'ka niʿ'matun tamunnuhā ʿalayya an ʿabbadtta banī is'rāīla
